GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics. If a filter_by is attched will return an array filtered by that value passed. If no sort_by or order set will default to sort_by 'created_at' and order 'descending'

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object when using a specific article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments relating to the article selected by ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: This will add a comment for the selected article

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: This will delete the specified comment and serve back no content. Comment_id has to be an integer
